system.description:
Persuasion involves convincing others through diplomacy, negotiation, or intimidation. It’s used to sway opinions, gather information, or broker deals with NPCs, leveraging your charisma and logic.

You make a Persuasion test to influence someone’s beliefs, motivations, or actions through reasoned discourse or forceful argumentation. Successes can be used to alter attitudes or gain valuable insights.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Change Opinions – Persuade NPCs to reconsider their viewpoints or support your cause.
  • Gather Information – Extract critical details or secrets through tactful questioning.
  • Negotiate Deals – Secure favorable terms in agreements or contracts.
  • Intimidate – Coerce others through implied threats or displays of dominance.
  • Build Trust – Establish rapport and foster alliances with hesitant allies.
